title: LF a support main i can duo with.
body:
IGN-Kylokylo
ADC in 2k17 lul. I have a silver V account and a bronze 3 account.
Lucian and Ezreal currently my 2 good adc's.{{champion:236}} {{champion:81}} 
I play jungle aswell.
I use discord and curse. Feel free to message me on League.

replies.body: I added you in game, hope that's cool!

Hey, I'm a Supp main. I'm only Bronze II though
I usually play either Janna and Soraka (So the more squishy supps) {{champion:40}} {{champion:16}} 
I can also fill except for ADC if needed
I use discord and have my own server.
TrippleXyone
